landing.p1: A website for reading, reciting and interpreting the Holy Quran
landing.p2: Discover the exquisite elegance of the Quran - Delve into the profound verses and timeless wisdom of the Quran

footer.about_desc: Rukn EL-Qur’an website is an ongoing charity. We hope to make it easier for everyone to read, study and learn the Holy Quran. The Holy Qur’an has many names, including the Holy Qur’an, the Book, the Criterion, the Sermon, the Remembrance, and the Light.
